author: NuSan
code:
function update()
 local t=getTime()
 local pcount=2000
 for i=0,pcount do
   local f=i/pcount
   local v=f*500.0+t
   local d=0.0+pow(f,0.5)*0.8*(1+sin(f*6.25+t*2)*0.2)
   local px=cos(v)*d
   local py=sin(v)*d
   local lim = 0.5+sin(t+py*3)*0.3
   px = abs(px-lim)-lim
   px = -abs(-px+lim)+lim
   point(px, py, abs(sin(f*500.0)))
 end
end
